    • Method Detail

      • shortestPath

        public static final java.util.LinkedList<SwitchPort> shortestPath(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.ArrayList<Link>> switches,
                                            java.util.Map<Link,java.lang.Integer> linkCosts,
                                            long src,
                                            long dst)
        Returns the shortest path between a source and a destination switch using Dijkstra's algorithm.
        Parameters:
        switches - a Map from switch ID to all links emanating from that switch (I.E: an adjacency list data structure)
        src - the source switch ID.
        dst - the destination switch ID
        Returns:
        a LinkedList of SwitchPorts that identify Links of the path.

      • getPath

        public static java.util.LinkedList<SwitchPort> getPath(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,SwitchPort> prev,
                                       long src,
                                       long dst)
        Constructs a path between a source and a destination switch given a previous-hops map generated by Dijkstra's algorithm
        Parameters:
        prev - the previous-hop map generated by Dijkstra's algorithm
        src - the source switch ID.
        dst - the destination switch ID
        Returns:
        a LinkedList of SwitchPorts that identify Links of the path.

      • DijkstraPrevHops

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,SwitchPort> DijkstraPrevHops(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.ArrayList<Link>> switches,
                                                            java.util.Map<Link,java.lang.Integer> linkCosts,
                                                            long src)
        Constructs a previous-hops map with Dijkstra's algorithm. Essentially, Dijkstra's algorithm is run and it computes shortest paths from the source to the rest of the switches in the topology. This state is saved as a previous hop map.
        Parameters:
        switches - a Map from switch ID to all links emanating from that switch (I.E: an adjacency list data structure)
        src - the source switch ID.
        Returns:
        a previous-hop map that identifies the best previous hop for all switches in the topology from the source switch.

      • getAllPaths

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<SwitchPort>> getAllPaths(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,java.util.TreeSet<SwitchPort>> prev,
                                                     long src,
                                                     long dst)
        Constructs a path between a source and a destination switch given a previous-hops map generated by Dijkstra's algorithm
        Parameters:
        prev - the previous-hop map generated by Dijkstra's algorithm
        src - the source switch ID.
        dst - the destination switch ID
        Returns:
        a LinkedList of SwitchPorts that identify Links of the path.

      • ECMPPrevHops

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,java.util.TreeSet<SwitchPort>> ECMPPrevHops(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.ArrayList<Link>> switches,
                                                                           java.util.Map<Link,java.lang.Integer> linkCosts,
                                                                           long src)
        Constructs a previous-hops map with Dijkstra's algorithm. Essentially, Dijkstra's algorithm is run and it computes shortest paths from the source to the rest of the switches in the topology. This state is saved as a previous hop map.
        Parameters:
        switches - a Map from switch ID to all links emanating from that switch (I.E: an adjacency list data structure)
        src - the source switch ID.
        Returns:
        a previous-hop map that identifies the best previous hop for all switches in the topology from the source switch.
